name: Shepherds Pie
preparation:
1. In a bowl, stir seasoning into water; set aside.

2. Peel and cube potatoes. Microwave in Multipurpose Steamer, covered, on high for 8–10 min.

3. Meanwhile, brown beef in a fry pan over medium-high heat. Stir in seasoning mixture. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and stir while simmering for 2 min. Stir in vegetables and heat through.

4. Using the Ground Meat Separator, mash potatoes with milk. Top meat mixture with potatoes and chives or green onions, if desired.
tips: Switch it up and top pie with mashed cauliflower or sweet potatoes. For a crispy crust, broil until golden.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy green salad with fresh lemon wedge.
